Class Genetics

extends java.lang.Object
    Class with the Genetic Functions.

      • crossover

        public static Board crossover(Board b1,
              Board b2)
        Crossover 2 Boards. split in half, then randomly 1 half with another half After that correction of wrong queens!
        Parameters:
        b1 - first board
        b2 - second board
        Returns:
        the crossover board
